member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule
member.summary: The DependencyInitializationModule class prepares the dependencies for the services and components supporting the 'Groups' feature set of the Social platform.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.ConfigureContainer(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.ServiceConfigurationContext)
member.summary: Prepares dependencies for group services and components, and registers them with the site's IoC system.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateGroupService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IGroupService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Group service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateRoleService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IRoleService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Role service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateMemberService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IMemberService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Member service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateAssociationService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IAssociationService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Association service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Initialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the initialization procedure for this module.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Groups.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Uninitialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the teardown procedure for this module.
